text: Marc Dierickx (born 24 October 1954) is a former Belgian racing cyclist. He rode in six editions of the Tour de France between 1979 and 1984. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian male cyclists Category:People from Temse Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Sportspeople from East Flanders
title: Marc Dierickx
